questions.question: Who is the author of Maniac Magee?
What was Maniac Magee's real name?
Why was the year it took Jeffrey to reach Two Mills called "The Lost Year?"

choices.answer: No one knows what he did during that year except run.
Maniac was lost for a year.
Maniac didn't remember anything that happened that year.
Maniac lost his favorite book that year.

questions.question: How did Amanda know that Jeffrey wasn't from the East End?

choices.answer: She knew everyone from the East End.
He said he wasn't from there.

questions.question: Which of the following is not one of Jeffrey's character traits?
Why was Maniac frustrated with his aunt and uncle?

choices.answer: They did not like that Maniac enjoyed running.
They forced him to participate in the spring musicale.
They would not allow him to move back to Bridgeport.
They hated each other & never did anything together.

questions.question: Where was Maniac originally from?
Why did Maniac leave Bridgeport?

choices.answer: He was upset with his aunt and uncle.
He moved to his aunt and uncle's house.
He didn't want to cause trouble for the Beales.

questions.question: Why did Jeffrey move in with his aunt and uncle?

choices.answer: His parents both  were killed in a car accident.

questions.question: Why don't the Pickwells notice Maniac at their dinner table?

choices.answer: They are eating at a Ping-Pong table.
He ran too quickly for them to see.
They all assumed someone else in the family knew Maniac.

questions.question: Which of the following is not a characteristic of McNab?

choices.answer: He was large for  his age.

questions.question: In Two Mills, why would't kids just stroll around on the opposite end of town?

choices.answer: They were not allowed to go to the opposite end of town.
They didn't visit the opposite end to avoid confrontations.
They enjoyed running to race each other.
They didn't like the adults that lived in the opposite end.

questions.question: Which is not true of Mrs. Beale

choices.answer: Mrs. Beale treats Maniac differently because he's white.
Mrs. Beale is kind to Maniac.

questions.question: Which statement best compares & contrasts how McNab felt before & after pitching to Maniac.

choices.answer: Mad before and pleased with himself after.
Nervous before and pleased with himself after.
Nervous before and mad at himself after.
Confident before and mad at himself after.

questions.question: How does Maniac feel about not having a home?
Why couldn't Maniac see "this color business?"

choices.answer: He always treated everyone fairly regardless of skin color.
He thought everyone was different shades, not white or black

questions.question: Which of the following was not true of the man who told Maniac to "go back to your own kind?"

choices.answer: He was an older man with white hair.
He was wearing baggy pants, slippers, & a pajama top.
He was a high school kid.

questions.question: Why did Amanda encourage Maniac to untie Cobble's knot?

choices.answer: She wanted her family to win free food for a year.
She thought everyone would love him and allow him to stay.
She was interested in sharing the pizza prize with him.
She wanted to get her picture in the paper with Maniac.

questions.question: Why did Maniac walk out of town instead of running?

choices.answer: No one would cross the middle of town to chase him.
He was tired from untying the knot.

questions.question: How has living in the East End changed Maniac?

choices.answer: He becomes a better and faster runner.

questions.question: Why was Amanda so upset when everyone was celebrating?

choices.answer: Mars Bar made fun of her for living with Maniac.
She was upset that Maniac left town.
She was upset that Maniac untied the knot & she couldn't.
Her "A" encyclopedia was all ripped up.

questions.question: Why does Mars Bar hate Maniac Magee?
What was written with chalk on the Beale's house?
What does converged mean?

choices.answer: Came together at a single point
